Player History
Won World Championship with Detroit in 1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Houston in 1978...
Injured on 7/7/1978 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 7/25/1980 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/22/1982 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/22/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/6/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $4,250,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
